long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension that routes you to google map's website to give you directions from your current location to the location or address that you highlighted.

This helps when looking up places from your current location when you need to do that often. It is useful for certain jobs or for planning a trip.
